Text:
A: 9
V: 8

Decent movie. But not for the masses.
Liked it for being different from all the other movies in the industry. Psychological dramas are a rarity these days in Malayalam cinema.

I couldn't see the pictures hosted in Imageshack. So here's a few screen caps from the movie:
